text: Susan "Sue" Speer C.Psychol, FHEA is a senior lecturer at the School of Psychological Sciences, University of Manchester. From 2005 to 2006 Speer was an ESRC-SSRC collaborative visiting fellow in the department of sociology at the University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA). == Selected bibliography == === Forthcoming === * === Books === * * === Chapters in books === * * * * * * * * ::With a response by Hammersley, Martyn: 'Analytics' are no substitute for methodology: A response to Speer and Hutchby * * * * * * === Journal articles === * * * * ::With a response: :::Rejoinder: * * ::With a response: ::With a response: ::With a response: :::Rejoinder: * * * ::With a response: :::Rejoinder: * * * ::A response to: * * * * ::A response to: :::Rejoinder: * ::A response to: Pdf of pp. 615–646. * * * * * == References == == External links == * Susan Speer: profile page, Manchester University Category:Academics of Loughborough University Category:British psychologists Category:British sociologists Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:University of California, Los Angeles faculty Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Alumni of Loughborough University
